name: Fintech to YNAB
description: Automatically push Monzo and Starling transactions into YNAB

SKIP_AUTO_CLEAR.description: By default, we mark transactions in your account's currency as cleared, this allows you to skip that (Monzo only)

SKIP_EMOJI.description: By default, we include the emoji from Monzo in the YNAB description. This skips that. (Monzo only)

SKIP_TAGS.description: By default, we include the hashtags from Monzo in the YNAB description. This skips that. (Monzo only)

URL_SECRET.description: This is a secret used for the webhooks endpoint.

STARLING_YNAB_ACCOUNT.description: Your YNAB account name used by Starling

MONZO_YNAB_ACCOUNT.description: Your YNAB account name used by Monzo
